Installation of SpinxÂ¶

$ pip3 install sphinx

$ pip3 install myst_parser (for markdown - not working currently) $ pip3 install sphinx_rtd_theme (for theme)

$ cd /path/to/project

$ mkdir docs

$ sphinx-quickstart

  1. on conf.py change the html_theme to sphinx_rtd_theme

  2. modify index.rst accordingly

$ make html

  1. create a repository and push the project you just created
